roleDescription: A Head of Product oversees the development and management of products, setting strategy, vision, and ensuring execution. They conduct market research, define product requirements, and work with cross-functional teams.
responsibilities: Define a clear product vision and strategy.
Conduct competitive analysis and market research.
Gather and prioritize product and customer requirements.
Collaborate with engineering, design, and marketing teams.
Monitor product performance and user feedback.
Make data-driven decisions to drive product improvements.
Supervise a team of product managers and related personnel.
Manage product budgets and forecast resource needs.
Ensure products align with business goals and market needs.
skills: Excellent analytical and strategic thinking skills.
Proficiency in data analysis and forecasting models.
Deep understanding of customer needs and market trends.
qualifications: Proven experience as a Head of Product, Director of Product, or similar role.
Experience in product management, preferably in a related industry.
Familiarity with web analytics, CRM software, and agile methodologies.
BSc/BA in Business, Marketing, Engineering, or relevant field; MSc/MBA or relevant certification (e.g., CFA/CPA) is a plus.
additionalNotes: The Head of Product plays a crucial role in driving innovation, guiding product teams, and aligning product initiatives with business objectives. They should have a passion for product development and a track record of successful product launches.
